Name: Caf√© 't Hooischip
Review Text: An amazing pub!!! You need to try this one and most of all, check the interior !! An old pub of Amsterdam, a great historical value. Great service and good food!!! Just try it and see it for yourself!!

Name: Caf√© 't Hooischip
Review Text: Cosy little place split over a few levels. the beer is good and the views not to shabby either. We didn't eat there but we did smell others eating and it's smelt pretty good to me. Staff seem happy go lucky and eager to help too. ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© 't Hooischip
Review Text: Now this is an old bar next to the river with fantastic views and a great place to watch the world go by. Reasonably priced and friendly staff. Deffo worth a visit.

Name: Caf√© 't Hooischip
Review Text: Stumbled across this place and what a find. Old fashioned bar on two levels. Full of locals enjoying a beer and conversation. Good beer selection and nice assortment of simple food: sandwiches, tosti and soup. The food was excellent, particularly the pea soup. Fantastic warm service and a lovely relaxed atmosphere.

Name: Caf√© 't Hooischip

Name: Caf√© 't Hooischip

Name: Caf√© 't Hooischip
